answers.answer: Usually doctor won't suggest inducing till around 40 weeks of if they feel baby is to "big".
Ok thank u I just don't want my son to get to big and have end up having a c-section
They will monitor you :) my friend has GD and had a 7lb baby :)
My doctor doesn't only checks heartbeat and with measuring tape thing but other then that nothing
The measuring tape is pretty accurate if you were to have a big baby you would measure two weeks ahead.

question: So I'm already dilated n will be 38 weeks wensday n I also have gestational diabetes but my doctor hasnt brought up inducingHas anyone went thru this ?
